The language used in the president: s National Security Council memo is compared to the language used by President George W. Bush in 2001 and President Barack Obama in 2009.
The makeup of the full National Security: including the presence of the Director of National Intelligence and the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, is found to be identical in all three presidents' memos.
However: the inclusion of the chief strategist, Steve Bannon, in Trump's memo is unique and not seen in the previous presidents' memos.
